posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen
I have a few tough cards available for sale or trade for Zeenut cards from 1911-1920.  Below is what I have available.  Scans of any are available upon request and prices include shipping/insurance.

t205 Johnson SGC 30 - solid card for the grade - one tiny corner wrinkle - $465
t210 Series 8 Burnett VG - tiny wrinkle...very tough card in a tough series - $325
t207 Downey SGC 10 (anon back) - very tough card - $175 (on hold)
t207 Works GAI 1 (anon back) - wrinkling but a tough card (on hold)
t213-1 Cranston GD/VG - tiny corner wrinkles - $145

Thanks in advance for any interest.  Regards,
Brian
redmaccie@hotmail.com

Posted By: Dave S
Brian--LMK if the Works comes off "hold"..
